videos.headline: Reid goes baseline for monster jam
videos.description: Naz Reid drives the baseline and blows by a defender to throw down a powerful slam.

videos.headline: Taylor cuts flushes baseline slam
videos.description: Marlon Taylor goes backdoor on his defender and stuffs a two-handed baseline jam.

article.description: Emmitt Williams had 14 points and nine rebounds, and No. 19 LSU beat College of Charleston 67-55 on Thursday night to reach the AdvoCare Invitational semifinals.

video.headline: Reid dunks all over Charleston defender
video.caption: Naz Reid drives hard to the rack and punches a dunk in right in the face of a Charleston defender.
video.description: Naz Reid drives hard to the rack and punches a dunk in right in the face of a Charleston defender.
video.title: Reid dunks all over Charleston defender

article.headline: No. 19 LSU beats College of Charleston 67-55

images.name: Reid dunks all over Charleston defender
images.caption: Naz Reid drives hard to the rack and punches a dunk in right in the face of a Charleston defender.

article.linkText: No. 19 LSU beats College of Charleston 67-55
article.story: LAKE BUENA VISTA, Fla. -- Emmitt Williams had 14 points and nine rebounds, and No. 19 LSU beat College of Charleston 67-55 on Thursday night to reach the AdvoCare Invitational semifinals. Skylar Mays added 12 points for the Tigers, who will play Friday night against No. 14 Florida State or UAB. LSU (5-0) is off to its best start since opening 6-0 in 2012-13. Tigers freshman Naz Reid, slowed by an ankle injury, had six points and two rebounds in 15 minutes. The forward had four points over 10 minutes in last Friday's 74-67 win over Louisiana Tech. College of Charleston (3-2) got a season-high 27 points and nine rebounds from Jarrell Brantley. It was his 19th game of 20 or more points. The Cougars dropped into the consolation bracket and will face the loser of the game between Florida State and UAB.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
